Job Description

Infosys is seeking a Devops automation developer, This position will add value to a gamut of Software Development lifecycle stages; will create detailed design artifacts like program specifications, test plans; and independently develop and review code and contribute to the go-live plan. You will have the opportunity to collaborate with some of the best talent in the industry to create innovative high quality and defect-free solutions to meet our clients’ business needs; will be part of a learning culture, where teamwork and collaboration are encouraged, excellence is rewarded, and diversity is respected and valued

Required Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent required from an accredited institution. Will also consider three years of progressive experience in the specialty in lieu of every year of education.
Candidate must be located within commuting distance of Tampa, FL. be willing to relocate to the area. This position may require travel to project location
At least 2 years of experience in Information Technology.
U.S. citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. are encouraged to apply, we are unable to sponsor at this time.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience automating repetitive tasks (e.g. scripting via Bash, Python, Ruby, etc)
Practical
Experience with Docker containerization and clustering (Kubernetes/ECS)
Version control system experience in Antifactory, Nexus Sonatype, GitLab
Experience implementing CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins
Experience in UI and API Automation using one of these technologies – Selenium, cucumber, Serenity, Protractor, JMeter, RestAssured, Docker, Postman tools
Experience with infrastructure-as-code using either Rancher, Cattle or Terraform, Consul, Vault
Strong experience with Linux-based infrastructures, Linux/Unix administration, and AWS
Strong experience with databases such as Oracle, PL/SQL, Postgres
Experience maintaining and deploying highly-available, fault-tolerant systems at scale
Testing using Selenium, Appium, Katlan Studios
Load testing using JMeter, Blaze meter, Gatling, Grinder or similar
Knowledge and experience with full SDLC lifecycle
Experience with Lean / Agile development methodologies

The job entails sitting as well as working at a computer for extended periods of time. Should be able to communicate by telephone, email or face to face. Travel may be required as per the job requirements.

.NET Developer (Sitecore Certified)


An award-winning digital transformation company that delivers innovative digital experiences and technical applications to their customers is looking for a .NET Developer to work on CMS development projects. Specifically, they are seeking a developer with at least 3+ years experience, Sitecore certification is required. All candidates should also have experience working with responsive web technologies. They projects will support government contracts so US citizenship is required. This is a remote work friendly position. 


Responsibilities: 


  • Development using C#, following agile, iterative, or traditional methodologies; test and verify development
  • Participating in the full life-cycle of software development, including requirements gathering, estimating, development, testing and support developing, maintaining, and innovating. Integrating systems using internal and third party APIs.
  • Participating in all phases of the development process
  • Assist in the collection and definition of business and technical requirements
  • Assure delivery of final product based on requirements
  • Ability to work with a cross-functional team and excellent communication skills
  • Adhering to software development best practices, including Section 508 and W3C standards.


Skill Set Requirements/Qualifications 


  • Sitecore Certified 
  • US Citizenship 
  • Hands-on experience using Sitecore or comparable .NET based CMS
  • Highly motivated, detail-oriented individual with excellent problem solving skills and a passion for delivering high-quality products
  • Full-life-cycle software development
  • Dedicated to the creation of highly usable websites that optimize the user experience
  • 3+ years’ experience with ASP.NET using C# and ADO.NET
  • 3+ years’ experience with SQL/TSQL and SQL Server 
  • 3+ years’ experience with Web Services and XML
  • 3+ years’ experience working within a structured (iterative models preferred) development lifecycle methodology
  • Experience leveraging documented APIs
  • Experience identifying and addressing performance and scalability issues
  • Experience and understand of cloud and delivery automation technologies, Azure & Azure Devops a significant plus.
  • Proven ability for developing high-volume web applications.
  • Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, and CMS solution integration.
